void Sonetto::TailedWindow::setTileMode ( bool  mode  ) 

Set the background tile mode.

Parameters:
mode The way this TailedWindow will texturize the background False: Stretch the texture to the border of the object True: This will map the baground based on the screen (note: the result depends upon the Screen Metrics Mode for this object)

void Sonetto::TailedWindow::setWindowTail ( bool  visible,
bool  dir,
float  pos 
)

Show or Hide the TailedWindow Tail, set it's direction and it's position.

Parameters:
visible The tail visibility, false for invisible and true for visible.
dir The tail direction, false is down, true is up.
dir The tail position, range from 0.0 to 1.0, from one side of the TailedWindow to the other.
